question: Late Hargobind Khorana had received Nobel Prize in physiology in 1968, for work on which among the following?
option1: Mechanisms of the action of hormones
option4: Structural and functional organization of the cell
explanation: Late Hargobind Khorana had received Nobel Prize in physiology in 1968, for work on interpretation of the genetic code. Har Gobind Khorana was an Indian American biochemist.
